attributes.additional_details:
The vacuum we have left has contributed to many worrying trends.
Without action the life jackets will keep piling up on the shores of Europe as desperate people continue to flee. And the flames of this conflict will continue to rise, driving even more Syrians from their country or into the arms of extremists.
Act now.
attributes.background: When the PM came to Parliament asking MPs to back military action against ISIS he promised that UK would work 'day and night' to secure a peaceful end to the conflict. Sadly, two months on there is little progress to report either at the negotiating table or in the UK playing a more active role.

rejection.details: We're not sure what specific action you would like the Government or Parliament to take. You could start a new petition asking clearly for a specific action.
